Break points

Source: vignettes/articles/breakpoints.Rmd
breakpoints.Rmd

Break points

horizontal_break <- function(breakpoint, layout) {
  cards(data = galleries[1,], title = long_name, image = image_url, text = blurb,
        layout = "label-right", breakpoint = breakpoint, width = 4)
}
horizontal_break(breakpoint = 1)
horizontal_break(breakpoint = 5)
Ash Cloud and Blood

Simulated watercolours in ggplot2 using the transparent polygon method

Ash Cloud and Blood

Simulated watercolours in ggplot2 using the transparent polygon method

inset_break <- function(breakpoint, layout) {
  cards(data = galleries[1,], title = long_name, image = image_url, text = blurb,
        layout = "inset-top", breakpoint = breakpoint, width = 3)
}
inset_break(breakpoint = 1)
inset_break(breakpoint = 5)
Ash Cloud and Blood

Simulated watercolours in ggplot2 using the transparent polygon method
